name: vrview
description: Embed VR content into your webpage.

scripts.build-min: npm run _mkdir && browserify src/embed/main.js | derequire | uglifyjs -c > build/embed.min.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-dev: npm run _mkdir && browserify src/embed/main.js | derequire > build/embed.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-analytics-min: npm run _mkdir && browserify src/embed/with-analytics.js | derequire | uglifyjs -c > build/embed.min.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-analytics-dev: npm run _mkdir && browserify src/embed/with-analytics.js | derequire > build/embed.js && npm run build-three-closure
scripts.build-api-min: npm run _mkdir && browserify --standalone VRView src/api/main.js | derequire | uglifyjs -c > build/vrview.min.js
scripts.build-api-dev: npm run _mkdir && browserify --standalone VRView src/api/main.js | derequire > build/vrview.js
scripts.build: npm run build-min; npm run build-dev; npm run build-api
scripts.build-analytics: npm run build-analytics-min; npm run build-analytics-dev; npm run build-api
scripts.build-api: npm run build-api-min; npm run build-api-dev
scripts.watch-api: npm run _mkdir && watchify --standalone VRView src/api/main.js -v -d -o build/vrview.js
scripts.build-three-closure: npm run _mkdir && rollup -c src/third_party/three/rollup.config.js && java -jar src/third_party/three/closure-compiler-v20160713.jar --warning_level=VERBOSE --jscomp_off=globalThis --jscomp_off=checkTypes --externs src/third_party/three/externs.js --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --js build/three.js --js_output_file build/three.min.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-analytics; npm run build-three-closure; npm run build-dms
